custom-action.name: timetravel
custom-action.description:
Run a Choas Monkey engineering scenario defined in Gremlin.
Possible parameters are: - GremlinToken (required): Gremlin API Token Default value is "Gremlin API Token". - GremlinTeamID (required): Gremlin Team ID Default value is "Gremlin Team ID". - GremlinTargetType (required): Type of target : hosts or containers Default value is "Type of target : hosts or containers". - GremlinTargetHostTags (required): List of tags seperated by a , Default value is "List of tags to select the host that will be target by the attack". - GremlinTarget (required): Select the target by Percent or exact Default value is "percent or exact". - GremlinTargetNumber (required): Number of targets that would be impacted ( in percentage or exact depends on the value the parameter GremlinTarget Default value is "Number of targets that would be impacted ". Changes the system time https://www.gremlin.com/docs/infrastructure-layer/attacks/timetravel
Possible parameters are: - Length (optional): The length of the attack (seconds) Value must be of type: Integer Default value is "60". - NTP (optional): Block NTP network communication Blackholes outbound udp traffic over port 123 Value must be of type: Boolean Default value is "false". - Offset (optional): The offset to the current time (seconds) Can be positive or negative Value must be of type: Integer Default value is "86400".

custom-action-parameter.name: GremlinTargetType
custom-action-parameter.value: Type of target : hosts or containers

custom-action-parameter.name: GremlinTargetHostTags
custom-action-parameter.value: List of tags to select the host that will be target by the attack

custom-action-parameter.name: GremlinTargetNumber
custom-action-parameter.value: Number of targets that would be impacted
